Event: Didn`t think of that.  Why can`t people just be nice? Why would anyone think it`s ok to say that, much less make a movie.
Post: "Why do people always have to be so mean? I'm just trying to live my life and be happy, but it seems like everyone else is determined to bring me down. I can't even enjoy a simple dinner without someone making a snide comment about my cooking. It's like they think it's funny to see me struggle. And don't even get me started on social media. The internet is full of trolls just waiting to pounce on anyone who dares to share their opinion or express themselves. It's a wonder anyone can muster up the courage to post anything online these days. But you know what? I'm not going to let them get me down. I'm going to keep being my awesome self, no matter what anyone else says."
